column1: This is the last day of our summer interns. Its been nice. We havent had interns for a while, ever since Michaels Monica Lewinsky incident.  He didnt do anything sexual.  He just made far, far too many Monica Lewinsky jokes.  It was just easier for corporate to shut down the program.
Nobody.
We havent told anyone Im pregnant.
Yeah, we dont want them at the wedding thinking Jims being marched down the aisle by my dad with a shotgum.
Nope.
Cant back out now, Halpert.
No, keep it up.
Just keep it to yourself then.
What?
Why did that come into your brain?
Who did you tell?
Nobody!
Sure, but we should get to the bottom of this. Lets pick a rumor and trace it back to the beginning.
Michael?  Hes over here!
Where are you going?
Dont get on it.
Dont... get... on. Do not.
Step away.
Jim.
Stop. Dont. Just...
Yes.
Okay.
Its clear why we were trying not to tell people. Thats clear now.
Youre right. We shouldve realized that you are an equal part of this.
You called Stanleys wife?
If you talk to her, youre gonna tell her about Stanley, and thats gonna seem more suspicious.
Michael, please dont.
Hey, Good luck.
Okay, its just three or four steps but thank you, thank you.
Yeah, I think the pregnancy really brought us together.
Ummm, I dont know.
Did I?  Doesnt sound like me, not very superstitious.
Please dont talk about my breast milk.
Yeah.
Hey Kelly.
Thank you.  Um, listen I just wanted to confirm that youre not coming to the wedding, which is totally understandable and more than fine.
I dont know, he hasnt RSVPd yet.

We invited everyone in the office to our wedding.  Even though we realized most people wouldnt be able to make the drive to Niagara Falls.   Which is why were having it in Niagara Falls.   Then Michael told everyone they could have Friday and Monday  off, if they came.  So now, people have to decide if they want to come to our wedding or have to work.
Hey Ryan.
So, I just wanted to confirm that youre not coming to my wedding.
It costs about $75 per person.
Can you just tell me now if youre coming or not?
Okay, Ryan Howard, yes.
Kelly Kapoor, yes.
Do you think that you could send in your RSVP card?
Well, you have to choose a food option and theres information in there about directions and lodging...
You are going to text me, the morning of my wedding.
To ask for directions..
And you will eat whatever is fanciest?
So rude, right?
Oh my gosh, I have been chasing people down all day.  Its incredible.
I need to fit into my wedding dress. However, Im also pregnant.
We did, but mostly because people expect us to. Were also accepting other gifts not on the registry... However much.
Its awkward asking people for money, but we could really use it. Why doesnt Crate & Barrel let you register for a toaster full of cash?
Oh, good.
No, were not.
I dont think we registered anywhere. We just want cash.
Mm-hmm.
Yeah.
Okay.
Is this what Ive become? Materialistic? Shallow? I feel horrible.  oh look! "Mrs. Pam Halpert!" Thats the first time Ive seen it in writing!
Why arent there any beans on this very old, frizzy-haired picture of me?
Jim?
Yeah, I mean, if its all the same for you.
$100 now for sure.
Yeah. No, no, Ill um-- the hundred. Ill just take the hundred.
How sure is this?
The guy has an algorithm to determine the winner of any given college basketball game.

Im sorry. You guys have probably noticed my stomachs a little more sensitive lately. So, if you wouldnt mind wearing a little less perfume... and if your lunch is especially pungent, maybe have it in the break room?
Phyllis, if you could switch to a different soap, just for a month or two? Yours is kind of perfumy.
I dont think Im asking for too much. I guess its just the end of courtesy in the workplace.
Yeah, but arent you supposed to do that to our... no. Its great.
Ok. All of these things are important to remember but the most important thing is no one say anything about my pregnancy at the wedding.
Well, were thinking of my grandmother who we havent told and is very old-fashioned.
You know, Angela, you dont have to come to the wedding.
Next time were all in this room Jim and I will be married.
Thank you, Dwight.
See you later.
Hey, my aunt told me something neat.
She said everything with the wedding goes by so fast we should try to take mental pictures of the high points.
Yeah.
Oh.
We should have hired a professional to take our mental pictures.
Can we take a look at the suite now?
Oh... is there another wedding at the hotel this weekend?
Im gonna need the name and cell phone number of the housekeeper responsible for changing the sheets, please.
Oh, Mema? Shes the one in the teal suit. Shes the only 80 year old with no smile wrinkles.
Hey, Mema.
Oh. Thank you... but nobodys perfect.
Oscar, Kevin, this is my sister, Penny. Shes also my maid of honor.
Oscar, it was an honest mistake.
She has a boyfriend. Hes out of town.
Like... a year.
Michael.
Michael. Stop.
Mema.
Hey, smooth guys.
Memas not coming to the wedding. Shes leaving tomorrow morning.
I was just going to go down to the hotel bar for a little bit.
I just wanted to get out of my room for a little while.
Nevermind.
Yeah.
No.
What?
Andy, I am getting married in 8 hours.
Hey, hey! Where are you?  Can you take Andy to the hospital?
He tore his scrotum dancing.
He is in my room icing his balls.
Please stop saying what.  Can you take him?
Your brothers took you out drinking?
Thats Michael.  Youre out with Michael?
Okay, fine.  Ill take him.
Are you pushing me off the phone?
Goodbye.

Look, Im not the one who asked you to do a split when youve never done one before.

Andy, did I dream that you were crying through the night?
Thank you weirdo.
Okay, here I come.
Thanks mom.
He does.
Yes. Thank you, mom.
Okay great.   Yeah, Ill see you in a second.   Wait, what?  Oh! Oh no!
Can you come here please?
No.  No, but Im allowing it.  Just come here.
Hey.
Terrible.
My veil tore.  I knew when we were getting married and Im five months pregnant that Im not going to be able to wear the dress that I always wanted or high heels--
Thank you.
No, this was the one thing I was supposed to be able to control, was this veil and--

Everyones driving me crazy.  I know way too much about Andys scrotum.   And my mom wont stop freaking out about my dads new girlfriend.   This is supposed to be our wedding day.  Why did we invite all these people?
You look great.
Mm-hmm.
Yes I did.
Go ahead.  I think its your turn.
Yeah, Im okay.
Saw it.
Hey Oscar.  Its Pam. Hey. Were on our honeymoon.
Unless someone very close to us is in immediate physical danger, you should not be calling us.
Are you kidding me?
Listen our credit card has been cancelled and we have to deal with that, and I really cant handle the fact that youre calling us here!
Oh I will. I will Kevin. I will make that my top priority.
It really was.
Oh my gosh. The honeymoon was great. We met this other couple at the resort, Frank and Benny. We hung out with them a lot.
Frank and beans!
Hi, Michael.
Some candy.

Hey!
Uh, we brought back some Puerto Rican candy.

I dont know. I think Michael has a date.
I think you have a date.
Come on.

Of course.
Oh.
Oh! Gossip, who is it? Who is it? Who is it, Michael? ...Who?
No, no, no, no, no.  Oh, no. Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Nooooo!
How could you do this to me? Hes my boss! How many times have I complained about him to you? No, I am not being dramatic, you are being crazy!
Thank you.
You need to be more upset about this. Shes your mother too now. Your mother is sleeping with Michael Scott.
Haha!  Ha ha ha.
I have a way to make Scranton a better place, you could leave it.
I love it, conservation.  Lets start by conserving our time and stop having these stupid meetings.     No more meetings!  No more meetings! No more meetings!  No more meetings!
Im not apologizing to anyone.  Michael owes me an apology.
Dont call my mother your lover.
Yes!  Thank you, welcome to my personal hell!
Shut up Oscar.  What is wrong with all of you, he is sleeping with my mother!
Whatever, you know, sleep with my mom, sleep with everybodys mom...
Uhh, huh, ho... oooh my God, you are ridiculous!
You are never going to be my father, you get out!
Me too...
Hey.
Oh, well, thanks Oscar.  I was just wondering how would you feel if Michael was sleeping with your mom?
Well, he could still... Im sorry about that... Oh could I just get you to sign this second page.
Sure, whats up?
Whats the matter, you cant fight your own battles?
Oh, would that make you feel better?
You can tell Michael that Im not leaving.
Michael, youre just her rebound!
What!  You knew?
Mmmmm, yes!
Then whyd you even offer!?
Michael, let me make this very easy for you, I could give a sh about your happiness!  Stop dating my mother!
Whats that supposed to mean?
Shut it!
Awww, he did that for me?
Mmmm.
Haha, yeah.  Say more nice things.
Maybe Im overreacting.
But I dont think I am.
Here we are outside-
- the Wilkes-Barre Industrial Park.
The two people with the lowest sales in the quarter have to do them.
Here it is.  Suite 401.
I know. Now you dont have to.
Oh. No, no.  Were not together. No, no, no. Definitely not. Definitely not. No. We just work together.
And wed like to offer you 15% off your first purchase as our way of welcoming you to the area.
Its ok.
Anyway, we also have a special on envelopes.
Yeah.
You were way meaner to me than I was to you.
You blew the sale, you idiot.
Oh-  Thank you.
Well, you know.
He loves to eat.
I love to watch him dance.
And Ill just watch him.
Yes.
Mmm-hmm.
It was, sweetie.
Yeah, well, thatll happen.
Sometimes were so excited we forget where we are. Like at a business meeting.
Yeah, I guess.
If Im being completely honest, I couldve done without the belly kiss.
Yeah. Way too much.
I mean, what the hell was that?
When you cried?
Youre fantsy involves comparison shopping birthing classes?
Hmm.
Well, are you dating anyone?
Ah.
Ah.
Hey, Erin. Do you mind faxing this for me?
Ok.
Mmm-hmm.
No. It was a total waste of time. Um... it was fun, though, because I got to spend the day with Andy Bernard. Hes really cool.
Yeah, he is.
Thats... right. Hes like Marlon Brando.
I actually do mean Marlon Wayan. Yeah.
Oh, no thank you.
I have an early lunch.

Michaels been trying to get Jim and me to hang out ever since he started dating my mom.  I dont know.  I really hoped this thing would just die out, but today hes planning a birthday lunch for my mom and we have to go.  No way out.  No way out.
Hey!   Hey. Happy birthday.
I think you guys all remember my mom from the wedding.
Kevin!
Yes, lets go.

Aww--

Home run Michael.

Michael.  Michael ,its okay.
I know that it took me a little while to come around and its still a little weird to get used to, but you obviously make my mom very happy.  And that makes me happy.
Well--
Michael.
What?
I am working.

Really?

I have the lowest sales record of anyone here.
I have the worst attitude of any person here.

I want to hit you.

Okay.
See you then.
Oh...
Right.
Okay.
Okay wait-- its-- youre saying it comes from the foot.
Okay.
Wow!

You have to keep your hands down, Michael.
Michael, you have to put your hands down.

Ill go.     My name is Deborah U. Tante.   Deb for short.

I do not.

I should just go.    Where to now Caleb?
Whats the news?
It wasnt me.  Im not goin down for this!
Get the keys out of my purse, start the car.

The thing I like most about Recyclops is that hes creating a different world for our child.
A world where you truly can be anything you want.
Thats great.
Sure.

Stuff gets around. I dont participate.
I forgot I have to support him no matter what. Close one.

Looks great.

No, wait, come on.  I didnt miss a day, I came in early, I stayed late, and I doubled my sales last month.
Yup.
Ah!

Is it funny? I thought it was more ...interesting, than funny.   I think my water just broke!
Oscar and the warehouse guy! Go Oscar! Go gay warehouse guy!

Matt?

So, check this out. According to the handbook, you could make more money as a salesman than as a manager. They have all these incentive programs. I ran your numbers from last year.

Michael...

I just wanted to check and see if theres anything you needed before I went on my maternity leave...  Yeah, Im pregnant...  Great, well, Ill write up the order.  Okay, thanks.
